name: gifcut
description: A GIF editor built with Tauri

scripts.sync-version: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json','utf8'));const v=pkg.version;const tauriPath='src-tauri/tauri.conf.json';const tauri=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(tauriPath,'utf8'));tauri.package=tauri.package||{};tauri.package.version=v;if(tauri.tauri&&Array.isArray(tauri.tauri.windows)){tauri.tauri.windows=tauri.tauri.windows.map(w=>{if(w&&typeof w==='object'){const titleBase=String(w.title||'GifCut').replace(/\s+v\d+(?:\.\d+){0,2}/i,'').trim();return Object.assign({},w,{title:titleBase+' v'+v});}return w;});}fs.writeFileSync(tauriPath,JSON.stringify(tauri,null,2)+'\n');const cargoPath='src-tauri/Cargo.toml';let cargo=fs.readFileSync(cargoPath,'utf8');cargo=cargo.replace(/(\[package\][\s\S]*?^version\s*=\s*\")[^\"]*(\")/m,(m,p1,p2)=>p1+v+p2);fs.writeFileSync(cargoPath,cargo);const indexPath='index.html';let html=fs.readFileSync(indexPath,'utf8');html=html.replace(/<title>\s*GifCut\s+v\d+(?:\.\d+){0,2}\s*<\/title>/i,'<title>GifCut v'+v+'</title>');fs.writeFileSync(indexPath,html);"
